bug.author: Yevgnen
bug.summary: wandb: WARNING Adding to old History rows isn't currently supported.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug description</denchmark-h>
When setup_wandb_logging is used, no metric is logged into wandb. Replace all setup codes in the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/ignite/blob/master/examples/contrib/mnist/mnist_with_wandb_logger.py>example</denchmark-link> with <denchmark-code> setup_wandb_logging( trainer, optimizers=optimizer, evaluators={"train_evaluator": train_evaluator, "val_evaluator": validation_evaluator}, ) </denchmark-code>
Sample output: <denchmark-code>2020-05-31 15:33:48,794 ignite.engine.engine.Engine INFO Engine run starting with max_epochs=10. 2020-05-31 15:34:15,116 ignite.engine.engine.Engine INFO Epoch[1] Complete. Time taken: 00:00:26 2020-05-31 15:34:15,116 ignite.engine.engine.Engine INFO Engine run starting with max_epochs=1. 2020-05-31 15:34:28,936 ignite.engine.engine.Engine INFO Epoch[1] Complete. Time taken: 00:00:14 wandb: WARNING Adding to old History rows isn't currently supported. Step 1 < 900; dropping {'train_evaluator/accuracy': 0.93575, 'train_evaluator/loss': 0.21386248969634375}. 2020-05-31 15:34:28,937 ignite.engine.engine.Engine INFO Engine run complete. Time taken 00:00:14 2020-05-31 15:34:28,937 ignite.engine.engine.Engine INFO Engine run starting with max_epochs=1. 2020-05-31 15:34:31,217 ignite.engine.engine.Engine INFO Epoch[1] Complete. Time taken: 00:00:02 wandb: WARNING Adding to old History rows isn't currently supported. Step 1 < 900; dropping {'val_evaluator/accuracy': 0.9388, 'val_evaluator/loss': 0.19922671020030974}. 2020-05-31 15:34:31,218 ignite.engine.engine.Engine INFO Engine run complete. Time taken 00:00:02 2020-05-31 15:35:00,453 ignite.engine.engine.Engine INFO Epoch[2] Complete. Time taken: 00:00:29 2020-05-31 15:35:00,454 ignite.engine.engine.Engine INFO Engine run starting with max_epochs=1. 2020-05-31 15:35:14,638 ignite.engine.engine.Engine INFO Epoch[1] Complete. Time taken: 00:00:14 wandb: WARNING Adding to old History rows isn't currently supported. Step 2 < 1800; dropping {'train_evaluator/accuracy': 0.95845, 'train_evaluator/loss': 0.13595107924938202}. 2020-05-31 15:35:14,639 ignite.engine.engine.Engine INFO Engine run complete. Time taken 00:00:14 2020-05-31 15:35:14,639 ignite.engine.engine.Engine INFO Engine run starting with max_epochs=1. 2020-05-31 15:35:16,887 ignite.engine.engine.Engine INFO Epoch[1] Complete. Time taken: 00:00:02 wandb: WARNING Adding to old History rows isn't currently supported. Step 2 < 1800; dropping {'val_evaluator/accuracy': 0.9615, 'val_evaluator/loss': 0.12946590296924115}. </denchmark-code>
When login to <denchmark-link:https://app.wandb.ai/>wandb</denchmark-link> , no metric is logged. <denchmark-h:h2>Environment</denchmark-h>
PyTorch Version (e.g., 1.4): 1.5.0 Ignite Version (e.g., 0.3.0):cfd0799 OS (e.g., Linux): macOS 10.15.5 How you installed Ignite (conda, pip, source): source Python version: 3.8.2

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Yevgnen>@Yevgnen</denchmark-link> thanks for reporting ! Indeed, as we log evaluators' metrics on epochs:
in addition to logging other stuff (lr, training metrics etc) on iterations, this is not supported by wandb... Let's see what can be done...
